h2_title: Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide
content: He’ll often follow this jumping attack with two spins of his spear until it lands behind him, and give you a big opportunity to commence an attack of your own as he recovers from the move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_King.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind King', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He’ll often follow this jumping attack with two spins of his spear until it lands behind him, and give you a big opportunity to commence an attack of your own as he recovers from the move.
